TEXT.TITLE: VIRCO MANUFACTURING CORP <VIR> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr 67 cts vs 69 cts Net 1,525,000 vs 1,570,000 Revs 41.2 mln vs 40.2 mln Year Shr 1.75 dlrs vs 1.54 dlrs Net 4,001,000 vs 3,522,000 Revs 172.3 mln vs 168.7 mln Note: figures include losses from discontinued operations in qtr of 309,000 dlrs, vs 253,000 dlrs a year earlier and for the year of 309,000 dlrs vs 1,559,000 dlrs a year ago. Reuter
